title: Brown County man dead in “accidental” shooting
content:
BROWN COUNTY, Wis. (WBAY) – The Brown County Sheriff’s Office is investigating the death of a man who accidentally shot himself.
On July 6, deputies responded to a Town of New Denmark where a 63-year-old man was found dead with a gunshot wound.
Investigators say it appears the man’s death was caused by “an accidental discharge of a weapon.”
The Sheriff’s Office says there is no danger to the public.
The man was home alone at the time of the incident.
The Sheriff’s Office is working with the Dane County Medical Examiner on the investigation.
